backend/main.mo: Main actor defining types and CRUD operations for vendors, quotation requests, quotations, and purchase requisitions with approval workflows, using in-memory maps for storage and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that preserves existing vendor, quotation request, and quotation data while adding an empty purchase requisitions map for backward compatibility during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented purchase requisition functionality including React Query hooks, form components, table views, and approval workflows with associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and configuration files describing the vendor management, quotation system, and purchase requisition features with earth-tone styling.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS with Tailwind layers defining earth-tone color palette in OKLCH format for light and dark modes, including sidebar, chart, and component-specific design tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Supply Chain Management App.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for vendors, purchase requisitions (list and detail), quotation requests, comparison, and submission pages.
frontend/src/components/AddVendorForm.ts: React Hook Form component for creating vendors with validation for company name, contact person, email, phone, address, and category fields, using the useCreateVendor mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CreatePurchaseRe: Form component for creating purchase requisitions with dynamic line items, using react-hook-form for validation and field arrays. Calculates total estimated cost and submits to backend via useCreatePurchaseRequisition hook.
frontend/src/components/CreateRequestFor: Form component for creating quotation requests with fields for description, quantity, unit of measurement, and delivery date. Uses react-hook-form and submits via useCreateQuotationRequest hook.
frontend/src/components/EditPurchaseRequ: Form component for editing existing purchase requisitions, allowing modification of line items and justification while displaying read-only requester and department info. Uses useUpdatePurchaseRequisition hook for updates.
frontend/src/components/EditVendorForm.t: Form component for editing vendor information including company details, contact info, and status. Pre-populates with existing vendor data and submits updates via useUpdateVendor hook.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component providing header with app branding, navigation, main content outlet, and footer. Uses TanStack Router for navigation and displays current route context.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Navigation bar component with icon-based menu items for vendors, purchase requisitions, quotation requests, comparison, and submission. Highlights active route and uses TanStack Router for navigation.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseRequisit: Component for viewing and managing purchase requisition approval workflow, including submit, approve, and reject actions with dialogs. Displays requisition details, line items, approval history, and status badges.

Displays a table of purchase requisitions with filtering by status, showing details like requester, department, cost, and status badges. Supports edit, delete, and view actions with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/QuotationCompari: Renders a comparison table of quotations for a specific request, displaying vendor details, pricing, delivery timelines, and status. Provides actions to shortlist, accept, or reject quotations.
frontend/src/components/QuotationRequest: Shows a filterable table of quotation requests by status (pending, received, closed), displaying request details like description, quantity, delivery dates, and current status.
frontend/src/components/QuotationSubmiss: Form component for vendors to submit quotations for pending requests, including unit price, delivery timeline, terms, and validity period with automatic total price calculation.
frontend/src/components/VendorTable.tsx: Displays all vendors in a table with company details, contact information, status badges, and actions for editing or deleting vendors with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for all backend operations including vendors, quotation requests, quotations, and purchase requisitions with CRUD operations and toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with earth-tone color palette using OKLCH color space, defining CSS variables for light/dark modes with olive green, terracotta, and warm beige accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseRequisitionDe: Detail page for a single purchase requisition that extracts the ID from route params and renders the approval component.
Purchase requisitions list page with tabbed status filtering, create dialog, and table display for managing requisitions through approval workflow.
frontend/src/pages/QuotationComparison.t: Page for comparing vendor quotations side-by-side with a dropdown to select quotation requests and display comparison table.
frontend/src/pages/QuotationRequests.tsx: Quotation requests list page with create dialog and table for managing requests sent to vendors.
frontend/src/pages/SubmitQuotation.tsx: Vendor-facing page with a form for submitting quotations in response to quotation requests.
frontend/src/pages/VendorManagement.tsx: Vendor management page with add vendor dialog and table for managing supplier network and relationships.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts, and animation utilities for accordion components.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking a purchase requisition system with approval workflow features. Contains existing features for React Query hooks, form components, table displays, approval workflows, and navigation integration with status tracking (Draft, PendingApproval, Approved, Rejected).
